title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2.7 - Issuance and delivery of license
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2.7 - Issuance and delivery of license

State Regulations

Upon the approval of an application, the commission will
issue and deliver a license to the pier superintendent or hiring agent by
transmitting the license to the applicant (employer) who shall be authorized to
deliver it to the licensee upon the commencement of his
employment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
